author: marvin
msg: Fix refcounting situation for CFCParcel objects, so that instead of leaking
them intentionally they are refcounted and destroyed appropriately.

author: jbellis
msg: update memtable_throughput to be a long
patch by jbellis; reviewed by brandonwilliams for CASSANDRA-2158

author: marvin
msg: Fix a memory leak in CFCDocuComment.c.

author: veithen
msg: Wiped the svn:mergeinfo properties from the trunk. They were only relevant for tracking merges from the 1.5 branch to the trunk. However we are no longer going to do that (all merges should go from the trunk to the release/maintenance branch).
